page.title: 04ECOLOGY
page.content: There is a varied amount of wildlife in our area. {Birds} Over our area we spotted 12 common species of birds ,they were Collard dove ,Song thrush ,Robin ,Blue tit ,House Sparrow ,Blackbird ,Swift ,Wood Pigeon ,Crow & Wren. {Mammals} In our area the main mammals are Rabbit ,Squirrel & Weasles.Their habitat is mainly dry areas apart from the Water Voles which live in the brook. {Trees} On the area that we covered the trees are mainly deciduous but there are some evergreens.They are mostly Lawson & Silver fir.The main deciduous are Sycamore & Lime.
